buffs.description: The human tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by human unit seals.
buffs.name: Human Token

hidden_abilites: Increases its movement speed by 8%, and its attack range by 10%.
Increases the attack range and the critical damage of all units by 5%, and the movement speed of all units by 6%.
Significantly increases attack power and critical hit rate against enemy crystal.
[ Limit Break of Human Token ] : The human tribe friendliness can be increased up to 150% by human unit seals.
description.skill1: Increases the Human Tribe Friendliness gained from Human Unit Seals (10%, 30%, 50%, 70%, 100%)
description.skill2: Increase attack speed of Human units in Outland Battle. (0%, 0%, 4%, 7%, 14%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Muskatress ]
